typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Order_id as string,
		Order_status as string,
		Due_date as timestamp,
		Created_date as timestamp,
		Customer_id as string,
		Order_total as decimal(9,2),
		Line_subtotal as decimal(9,2),
		Shipping_total as decimal(9,2),
		Tax_total as decimal(9,2),
		Billing_email as string,
		Billing_phone as string,
		Billing_firstname as string,
		Billing_lastname as string,
		Billing_address_1 as string,
		Billing_address_2 as string,
		Billing_city as string,
		Billing_state as string,
		Billing_postcode as string,
		Shipping_firstname as string,
		Shipping_lastname as string,
		Shipping_address_1 as string,
		Shipping_address_2 as string,
		Shipping_city as string,
		Shipping_state as string,
		Shipping_postcode as string,
		Shipping_provider as string,
		OrderItems as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderItems
OrderItems parse(OrderItems = OrderItems ? (ProductName as string, SKU as string) ,
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ParseJSON
ParseJSON sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
